name: Circle CI Project commands
precondition:
These test require that you connect to Circle CI with a GitHub user who has access to these 2 public repos.
https://github.com/DHaussermann/hello-world
https://github.com/DHaussermann/mattermost-plugin-custom-attributes

Contact Dylan if invites are needed.

inline.description:
Set default project
1. type /circleci default gh/DHaussermann/hello-world
inline.expectedResult: Post confirms that project has been successfully set
Successfully saved gh/DHaussermann/mattermost-plugin-custom-attributes as your default project

inline.description:
Add an environment variable for your default project
Type /circleci project env add varA pickles
inline.expectedResult: Successfully added environment variable varA:pickles for project <default project>

inline.description:
List environment variable for your default project
Type /circleci project env list
inline.expectedResult: Variable from Step 3. (and any pre-exsiting ones) is shown with partially redacted value xxxxles

inline.description:
List environment variable for your default project
1. Type /circleci project env /circleci project env remove varA
2. Type /circleci project env list
inline.expectedResult:
on 1.  Successfully added environment variable varA:pickles for project <default project>
on 2. varA for project is no longer listed

inline.description:
Show recent builds of the default project for a given branch
1. Type /circleci project recent-build master
inline.expectedResult: Circle Ci shows the results of the last 10 builds for the branch and data about them

inline.description:
Show list of projects you are following
1. Type /circleci project list-followed
inline.expectedResult: Circle Ci shows the projects the connected user is following.
